quote: We're using AI to simulate client interactions, allowing agents to practice their scripts in a realistic setting.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical application of AI in training agents.
suggested_hook: Discover how AI is transforming real estate training!

quote: Explaining commission structures upfront can save time and build trust with clients.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to adopt a transparent approach with clients.
suggested_hook: Why transparency in commissions is your new best friend!
